mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK b JOIN BOOK_HISTORY h ON b.ID = h.BOOK_ID WHERE (b.CREATED_BY = #{username} AND h.REQUESTED_STATUS = 'WAIT_FOR_RESPONSE') OR (b.CREATED_BY = #{username} AND h.REQUESTED_STATUS = 'RETURN_REQUEST') OR (h.REQUESTED_USER = #{username} AND h.REQUESTED_STATUS = 'REJECTED')
